unnormalised:
Konkani Translation:
Konkani Translation:
Konkani Translation:
Konkani Translation:

Trip-achi planning kortoleank ek suchovnni! IRCTC-cher train-anchi vell sodanch punha ekdam check kara. Udharonnak, Mumbai local 9:15 AM-ak sutt'tta mhunn dakhoita punn pavsalleak lagun 15-20 minttam dhir lagonk xakta. Toxench, vimaanache taalik 24-horanchea format-ant asta (udharonnak, 6:45 PM mhonnche bodlek 18:45 hrs). Xevttim, kaim airlines pounnche vell GMT-ant dakhoitat, dekhun Delhi airport-antle 22/12/2024-iche pudle vatter yenneak IST-chi 5:30 horanchi difference vicharache ghea.
normalised:
Konkani translation:

Trip plan kortol'leank ek suchovnni! Hamesha I-R-C-T-C velyan trenachim velancho purto tapash kara. Udharonnak, Mumbai local nove pondra A-M dakhovnk shakta punn pavsak lagun pondra te vis mintam ushir zawnk shakta. Tech bhaxen, vimanachim timimg'am sadharanponnanim vis ani char voranchea formatint astat, udharonnak, so ponn'as P-M bodla athra challis voram. Nimanne, laksh dyat ki kain viman kompneo G-M-T int pavoachea vell dakhoitat, dekhun I-S-T velean panch voram tis mintamchim antar dhyanat gheun, dhakleponnar Delhi viman tolliacherun tevis December don hazar ani chaovisacherun futtimchi iojon kori.

Trip-achi planning kortoleank ek suchovnni! IRCTC-cher train-anchi vell sodanch punha ekdam check kara. Udharonnak, Mumbai local 9:15 AM-ak sutt'tta mhunn dakhoita punn pavsalleak lagun 15-20 minttam dhir lagonk xakta. Toxench, vimaanache taalik 24-horanchea format-ant asta (udharonnak, 6:45 PM mhonnche bodlek 18:45 hrs). Xevttim, kaim airlines pounnche vell GMT-ant dakhoitat, dekhun Delhi airport-antle 22/12/2024-iche pudle vatter yenneak IST-chi 5:30 horanchi difference vicharache ghea.
